name: Torch (youhuanyi)
description:
The world is over. There are zombies out there.Fortunately, these zombies only move during the day when there is light, and there is no danger when there is no light

You need to go out at night to look for food in relative safety, but the night is cold, you need to hold a torch to warm, but the light of the torch will attract nearby zombies, press the space bar to lift or lower the torch, arrow key move, live longer!

This game is an entry for the "Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1" Jam game. The Jam theme is "Temperature is Key", which is not a fun theme to be honest, so this game will not be updated, thanks for playing
